title: Zeppelin Ward
body:
Zeppelin Ward

A new type of ward never seen before. 

A flying ward that is anchored to the ground, it can see over walls in a 1200 radius, it last 180 seconds. Yea yea, pretty lame and general. But a twist. It can be captured by the enemy team as well. Cost 50 gold. It only last 180 sec, though duration of any captures, not reset.

no1 ever gonna buy it even if it is op as ;)

replies.body:
with a ward like that, might as well fly to bronze. 
{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
hell yea. Give aids to all who buy it, but if you can protect it, be very very opp

> with a ward like that, might as well fly to bronze. 

This cracked me up. :')
